name: Super Circle Jump
description:
Concentration and fast reflexes are key to master this action-arcade game! Play with your friends and make it to the top of the leaderboard!

★ Features ★
• highly addictive fast paced action-arcade game
• easy to learn, hard to master
• connect with your friends and challenge them
• powerful music and nice visuals
• online leaderboard
• plenty of achievements
• no In-App Purchases except the possibility to remove ads
